long_description: The women's evolv Plaid Chalk Bag combines a sense of modern fashion with a highly functional design that'll keep you looking sharp and chalked up when your hands begin to sweat as you climb. Wide and rigid rim maintains the opening and shape of the bag. Rounded, ergonomic shape fits most hands. Soft fleece lining retains chalk and is gentle on the hands. Adjustable-length belt is included with the evolv Plaid Chalk Bag. Drawcord closure reduces spillage of chalk. Elastic loop holds a bouldering brush (not included).
short_description: The women's evolv Plaid Chalk Bag combines a sense of modern fashion with a highly functional design that'll keep you looking sharp and chalked up when your hands begin to sweat as you climb.
